revised_title: Obituary Notices of Fellows Deceased: Sir William Gowers and Richard Lydekker
tldr: This article provides obituary notices for Sir William Gowers, a renowned neuropathologist, and Richard Lydekker, a geologist and paleontologist. Gowers made significant contributions to the study of nervous system diseases, while Lydekker was known for his work on fossil vertebrates and the geology of Kashmir.
